title: 경험 이야기 듣기
description: 다양한 경험에 대한 이야기를 듣고 이해합니다.

audio.text: Hi! My name is Emma. [PAUSE] I have traveled to many countries. [PAUSE] I have been to France, Spain, and Italy. [PAUSE] I have tried many different foods. My favorite was Italian pasta! [PAUSE] I have also learned some French and Spanish. [PAUSE] I have made friends from all over the world. [PAUSE] Traveling has been an amazing experience!
